thread.title: Will you be affected by the overnight A1 closures in Gateshead?
thread.title_full: Will you be affected by the overnight A1 closures in Gateshead? | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Will you be affected by the overnight A1 closures in Gateshead?
text:
Sections of the A1 in Gateshead will be closed overnight from this evening, July 20th.
Works to install drainage systems on the A1 between junctions 67-73 in Gateshead are planned for six-nights.
Will you be affected?
Monday 20 July:
The northbound A1 will be closed from junction 67 (Coalhouse) to junction 73 (Derwenthaugh) between 8pm until 6am. The southbound A1 will also be closed from junction 69 (Gateshead Quays A184) to junction 67 (Coalhouse) between 8pm until 6am. The A184 westbound full carriageway closure between 8pm until 6am. Tuesday 21 July:
The northbound A1 will be closed from junction 67 (Coalhouse) to junction 69 (Gateshead Quays A184) between 8pm until 6am. The southbound A1 will also be closed from junction 68 (Lobley Hill) to junction 67 (Coalhouse) between 8pm until 6am. Wednesday 22 July until Friday 25 July:
The northbound A1 will be closed from junction 67 (Coalhouse) to junction 69 (Gateshead Quays A184) between 8pm until 6am. The northbound A1 will be closed from junction 68 (Lobley Hill) to junction 67 (Coalhouse) between 8pm until 6am. Friday 25 July until Saturday 26 July: The A184 westbound full carriageway will be closed between 8pm until 6am. The closures will take place as work continues on the Â£61 million A1 Coal House to Metro Centre improvement scheme.
Once the scheme is complete, almost 4 miles of the A1 will be widened to 3 lanes in both directions from the Coal House junction up to the Metro Centre junction.
Work is expected to be completed by Spring 2016.
Last updated Mon 20 Jul 2015 Travel Travel Tyne and Wear
